content: tried this but not working. 1) created a bot in my settings thinking that was appriopriate: here are the git settings...
Best to follow the instructions at https://chat.fhir.org/integrations/#github_webhook
You will need to obtain a certificate. Once the dns entries are in place you u could get your own via LetsEncrypt... or you could ask Grahame for one.
Then you'll need to configure your server to use that certificate.

Linking the git repo issues to Argo stream. Josh's instruction are geared more towards branch updates but was helpful (bot, key) and it worked using the the Github's Integration and services feature in settings. Only thing was I kept trying the 'Test Service' button which it turns out does nothing. But actually updating the issue works.
